  • Method Details

    • viewMyCamp

      public List<String> viewMyCamp(String userID)
      stores filtered list in class For User student: returns camps joined by student

      For User staff: returns camps created by staff

      Parameters:
      userID - The unique ID of the User
      Returns:
      a list of sorted camps of user

    • viewCamps

      public void viewCamps(String userID)
      Set default filter for viewing all camps after today

      and stores the filtered list in the class For User student: set filter visible, open to their faculty, and has remaining slots in camp

      Parameters:
      userID - The unique ID of the User

    • listOfCampRequest

      public List<String> listOfCampRequest()
      provides a filtered list of camps based on filter set.
      Returns:
      list of campID sorted alphabetical by camp name

    • FilterBy

      public void FilterBy(String userID, String location, boolean openParticipantSlots, boolean openCommSlots, String fromDate, String toDate, boolean onlyFaculty, boolean visibility)
      sets the filter by user and stores the filtered list into the class
      Parameters:
      userID - The unique ID of the User
      location - filter by location
      openParticipantSlots - filter by camps with available participant slots
      openCommSlots - filter by camps with available camp committee slots
      fromDate - filter by after start date
      toDate - filter by before end date
      onlyFaculty - filter by user faculty if true, by NTU if false
      visibility - filter by visible camps if true

    • getCampParticipantsList

      public List<String> getCampParticipantsList(String campID)
      provides a list of camp participants by campID
      Parameters:
      campID - The unique ID of the Camp
      Returns:
      List of studentID sorted alphabetically by name

    • getCampCommitteeList

      public List<String> getCampCommitteeList(String campID)
      provides a list of camp committee members by campID
      Parameters:
      campID - The unique ID of the Camp
      Returns:
      List of studentID sorted alphabetically by name
